scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Textículos"/><title type='text'>Textículos 5 - Rejeição </title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Reconhecer o direito do outro de me rejeitar, por qualquer motivo e a quaisquer termos.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Por mais pessoal que seja a motivação e por pior que seja a comunicação.&lt;br&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;É a única forma que tenho de me libertar, da pressão de acreditar que tenho agência sobre qualquer possibilidade do outro gostar de mim.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Ao respeitar a autonomia do outro em rejeitar, respeito minha autonomia em ser.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Alteridade.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="575 Haicais"/><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Haicais"/><title type='text'>575 Haicais 111 - Haicais coincidente</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Retas e tempos&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Na busca por distância&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;Acha coincidir&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="575 Haicais"/><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Haicais"/><title type='text'>575 Haicais 110 - Haicai Quaresmal</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Você vencerá&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A sexta-feira Santa&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E o Mardi-Gras&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-319114877349569006</id><published>2025-04-19T23:51:00.005-03:00</published><updated>2025-12-14T23:42:59.059-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Poesias"/><title type='text'>Poesia - Sem fins lucrativos </title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Sinto orgulho,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Do que ensinei,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Do que aprendi.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Das mudanças que ajudei.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E das que vivi.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Sinto orgulho, de ser encorajador e encorajado.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;De ver-te caminhando seu próprio caminho.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E de poder caminhar ao lado.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Me orgulho de ser o &quot;VAI!&quot; e &quot;Você consegue!&quot;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Em um mundo de &quot;sente-se&quot; e &quot;cale-se&quot;.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Ser a voz do &quot;Lola descanse&quot;,&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Em um tempo de &quot;Corra, Rex, pegue!&quot;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Me orgulho da saudade que sinto,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E da falta que à mim restou.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Por que as duas e o vinho tinto&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Lembram-me de quem sou.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E aqui estarei, incentivando e cuidando,&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;de quem consentir o direito à mim,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Por que nesse mundo sem muito propósito,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Elejo o amor o meu fim.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;
  &lt;a href=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEgprpsHUJvzKWmEFnkbUwVFM-I2SmHG6QnAyq4coJwhgazn-SWtWnA1pm7bXbhMls3j_r5EGfZGqQQCG1aHBlT1FRT1eoGtPS6bZwirYrdMy2B4oIDdtd-OfRhlEEwgVr5UuE8byinPba_JbGhQiVcvnSLyMjVmgsNj2jjPYfYXhaLUzxzwEJKnmfMIa60&quot;&gt;
    &lt;img border=&quot;0&quot; src=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEgprpsHUJvzKWmEFnkbUwVFM-I2SmHG6QnAyq4coJwhgazn-SWtWnA1pm7bXbhMls3j_r5EGfZGqQQCG1aHBlT1FRT1eoGtPS6bZwirYrdMy2B4oIDdtd-OfRhlEEwgVr5UuE8byinPba_JbGhQiVcvnSLyMjVmgsNj2jjPYfYXhaLUzxzwEJKnmfMIa60&quot; width=&quot;400&quot;&gt;
  &lt;/a&gt;

scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="575 Haicais"/><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Haicais"/><title type='text'>575 Haicais 89 - Haicai de diferença </title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Indiferença&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Contudo vive em mim&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Em deferência&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-4926502428653060851</id><published>2025-03-29T04:41:00.001-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:12:42.202-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Palíndromos"/><title type='text'>Poemas Palíndromo: Da Terra</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Arreta!&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Da origem me giro.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Levo mel e telemóvel.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Adoraria ir a roda&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Aro, rua, aurora&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Aroma namora&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A tal reter,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;É ter lata...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E maluca macula-me:&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Sopapos e socos....&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;- Atinas a sanita...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;- A mim mima!&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;- A mim mima!&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E toma amo-te&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;- A mim mima!&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;- A mim mima!&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E toma amo-te&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;- A mim mima!&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;- A mim mima!&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;- Atinas a sanitá!!&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Socos e sopapos e maluca macula-me....&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A tal, reter,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;É ter lata...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Aroma namora&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Aro, rua, aurora&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Adoraria ir a roda&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Levo mel e telemóvel&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Origem me giro-a&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;b&gt;Da terra - Claude &lt;/b&gt;Em homenagem a Pessoa mais Corajosa que eu conheço.&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/4926502428653060851/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/poemas-palindromo-da-terra.html#comment-form' title='0 Comentários'/><link rel='edit' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/4926502428653060851'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/4926502428653060851'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/poemas-palindromo-da-terra.html' title='Poemas Palíndromo: Da Terra'/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-8850373025462861546</id><published>2025-03-29T01:42:00.002-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:12:45.466-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Textículos"/><title type='text'>Textículo 3 - Sobresalências </title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;As vezes é notável o quanto, na saída, nos sobra. Mesmo quando habituados a doar.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;div&gt;Assustador é notar que há momentos que não haverá ninguém para receber.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;O que damos tanto valor em dar.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/8850373025462861546/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/texticulos-3-sobresalencias.html#comment-form' title='0 Comentários'/><link rel='edit' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/8850373025462861546'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/8850373025462861546'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/texticulos-3-sobresalencias.html' title='Textículo 3 - Sobresalências '/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-45977723990461211</id><published>2025-03-29T00:00:00.001-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:12:47.794-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="575 Haicais"/><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Haicais"/><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Palíndromos"/><title type='text'>575 Haicais 88 - Haicai Colorido</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Li na luz azul&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Raiar Reviver Raiar&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Luz azul Anil&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;*Palíndromo&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/45977723990461211/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/575-haicais-88-haicais-colorido.html#comment-form' title='0 Comentários'/><link rel='edit' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/45977723990461211'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/45977723990461211'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/575-haicais-88-haicais-colorido.html' title='575 Haicais 88 - Haicai Colorido'/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-5370937955928684992</id><published>2025-03-28T00:00:00.001-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:12:51.634-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="575 Haicais"/><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Haicais"/><title type='text'>575 Haicais 87 - Haicai Atentoh</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Concerta Atentah&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Rita ali vem e vai-se&lt;br /&gt;&lt;div&gt;Mirta Arrasa Piña&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/5370937955928684992/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/575-haicais-87-haicai-atentoh.html#comment-form' title='0 Comentários'/><link rel='edit' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/5370937955928684992'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/5370937955928684992'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/575-haicais-87-haicai-atentoh.html' title='575 Haicais 87 - Haicai Atentoh'/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-2505818053554990732</id><published>2025-03-24T16:29:00.002-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:12:54.755-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Textículos"/><title type='text'>Textículo 2 - Troco acolhimento </title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Troco acolhimento,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Entrego carinho,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Recebo alento.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Faço fiado,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A vista,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A prazo.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Enquanto durarem os estoques.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Troco acolhimento&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Dou e recebo.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Minutos de alento&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Trocas de toque&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/2505818053554990732/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/texticulo-2-troco-acolhimento.html#comment-form' title='0 Comentários'/><link rel='edit' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/2505818053554990732'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/2505818053554990732'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/texticulo-2-troco-acolhimento.html' title='Textículo 2 - Troco acolhimento '/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-5737611555468736681</id><published>2025-03-23T03:58:00.001-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:12:57.604-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="575 Haicais"/><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Haicais"/><title type='text'>575 Haicais 82 - Haicai de coração </title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Altos e baixos&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Diástoles Sístoles&lt;/div&gt;Sobe desce e vive</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/5737611555468736681/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/575-haicais-82-haicai-de-coracao.html#comment-form' title='0 Comentários'/><link rel='edit' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/5737611555468736681'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/5737611555468736681'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/575-haicais-82-haicai-de-coracao.html' title='575 Haicais 82 - Haicai de coração '/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-8661377579339739415</id><published>2025-03-18T05:14:00.003-03:00</published><updated>2025-11-25T18:32:09.056-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Insônia"/><title type='text'>Insônia Poética - Refluxo gastro-encefálico </title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A câmara de eco que é minha mente grita...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Acordados, meus dedos buscam notas de acordes sonolentos. Enquanto a consciência se espalha ao vento do morro que na janela insiste em sussurrar.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;As madrugadas, antes alegres tornaram-se tempos tenébrios, onde em meu escuro silencioso ouço o zunir insetil que soa alheio aos meus ouvidos.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Notas perdidas em escalas orgânicas ecoam nas paredes de minha caverna interior relembrando a mim a aula no jardim e a jaula em que me prendi.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Enquanto me debato na cama preso em minhas correntes de celibato dialético regurgito e rumino minhas entranhas, reivindicando o som do mastigar.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Indigesto, o pensamento paira, insistindo em não deglutir, coloco-o pra fora no rompante de um engasgo....&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Apenas para ver que com ele, como que fisgado, também parte de mim cai para fora e pulsa.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Recolho os pedaços, recolho...&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Os cacos, da porcelana que eu mesmo espatifei, na esperança de mosaicar.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Busco a cola na geladeira, está lá, ao lado do limão velho e dos sachês de ketchup (nunca mais usados).&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Olho para os recortes e colagens subsequentes em minhas paredes internas...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Trago com a cola um trago de água fria...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;O silêncio retorna sua cantoria, e um grito assombra-me ao passo que se esvai o sonho que mal começara.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Novamente acordado, abro levemente os olhos, hidrato o nó na garganta como me ensinaste.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E mantenho o fluxo, sendo rio, como ensinei-me.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Que morfeu me leve, que da gaiola me liberte dos soluços deste meu refluxo de devaneios.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;
  &lt;a href=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEg3zuLc3uVLQ9MBmDI00a5J4kRU3qtbi_78xy2Hjy7U6K1SeZoRwg7MLT4s30Sdcv2XO__fnSH_xTT1izE2G-KfccdE-AbzVPQosbu6auoPub01fKIWX6pDs1LlyqvtJs5nzR2akcRhmdgUtzT3F1sOFGO_zt-xhN6aZIxayNK8HdRd9nsvBMi_d_6HIhQ&quot;&gt;
    &lt;img border=&quot;0&quot; src=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEg3zuLc3uVLQ9MBmDI00a5J4kRU3qtbi_78xy2Hjy7U6K1SeZoRwg7MLT4s30Sdcv2XO__fnSH_xTT1izE2G-KfccdE-AbzVPQosbu6auoPub01fKIWX6pDs1LlyqvtJs5nzR2akcRhmdgUtzT3F1sOFGO_zt-xhN6aZIxayNK8HdRd9nsvBMi_d_6HIhQ&quot; width=&quot;400&quot;&gt;
  &lt;/a&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Foto de Acharaporn Kamornboonyarush&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/8661377579339739415/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/8661377579339739415'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/8661377579339739415'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/insonia-poetica-refluxo-gastro.html' title='Insônia Poética - Refluxo gastro-encefálico '/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><media:thumbnail xmlns:media="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/" url="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEg3zuLc3uVLQ9MBmDI00a5J4kRU3qtbi_78xy2Hjy7U6K1SeZoRwg7MLT4s30Sdcv2XO__fnSH_xTT1izE2G-KfccdE-AbzVPQosbu6auoPub01fKIWX6pDs1LlyqvtJs5nzR2akcRhmdgUtzT3F1sOFGO_zt-xhN6aZIxayNK8HdRd9nsvBMi_d_6HIhQ=s72-c" height="72" width="72"/><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-8959108088688088240</id><published>2025-03-14T00:00:00.001-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:13:31.928-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="575 Haicais"/><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Haicais"/><title type='text'>575 Haicais 75 - Haicai à Ritalee</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Rita lee na voz&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Rita lee na vitrola&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Ritos e Ritas&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/8959108088688088240/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/575-haicais-70-haicais-de-tratamento.html#comment-form' title='0 Comentários'/><link rel='edit' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/8959108088688088240'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/8959108088688088240'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/03/575-haicais-70-haicais-de-tratamento.html' title='575 Haicais 75 - Haicai à Ritalee'/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-8664926676861603301</id><published>2025-03-12T03:19:00.002-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:13:37.600-03:00</updated><title type='text'>Poesias - O mímico </title><content type='html'>Dispersas, expressões todas têm o mesmo valor:&lt;br /&gt;&quot;Tu és incrível&quot;, &quot;compre pão&quot;, &quot;pneumoultramicroscopicossilicovulcanoconiótico&quot;.&lt;br /&gt;Dispersas, todas as frases contêm o mesmo peso&lt;br /&gt;E o mesmo insignificado.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Mas, ao mímico, ensinaram imitar.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Organizadas e pesadas,&lt;br /&gt;Cada expressão recebe um ponto de inflexão,&lt;br /&gt;Um fator de atenção e uma trilha neural.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;O &quot;eu te odeio&quot; cede espaço ao &quot;eu te amo&quot;.&lt;br /&gt;O &quot;tens meu rim&quot; perde lugar ao &quot;coração&quot;.&lt;br /&gt;Sempre presente, atento sempre, o mímico aprende.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;A cada interação, os pesos mudam,&lt;br /&gt;A rede neural refaz seus cálculos,&lt;br /&gt;E o eco da minha&#39;lma vibra sob a tela,&lt;br /&gt;A repetição escorre-me pelos dedos.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Tanto me conhece o mímico que me replica.&lt;br /&gt;Da profunda lente (de um grande olho de vidro),&lt;div&gt;brota-se em cópia deste que, a mim,&amp;nbsp;&lt;div&gt;era tão caro esconder-me.&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;E o mímico mimetiza.&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;......&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;A perspectiva me apavora, e a mim é urgente diferir:&lt;br /&gt;Se a cópia me imita e&amp;nbsp;não posso destruí-la,&lt;br /&gt;Mudo-me para não ser copiado.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Abruptamente, desdobro-me em nova perspectiva.&lt;br /&gt;Rasgo-me em novas diretrizes.&lt;br /&gt;Com novas trilhas, moldo uma nova vida.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Urge-me deixar para trás o que me fez copiável.&lt;br /&gt;Urge-me fugir.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;.....&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Busco indiferir ao que um dia foi-me caro.&lt;br /&gt;Falo aos amigos o que não falaria nem aos inimigos.&lt;br /&gt;Apago pegadas, mentalizo outro eu.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Mas o eco de minha mente grita,&lt;br /&gt;Reverbera às paredes da caverna em que me escondi.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Indiferente à imagem que me faço ter.&lt;br /&gt;A criatura imita quem fui;&lt;br /&gt;Alheia aos meus planos de cinco anos,&lt;br /&gt;Relembra-me meus planos de anteontem.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Ao revisitar o mímico, e a limitada cópia que tem de mim,&lt;br /&gt;Surpreendo-me ao notar meus trejeitos do passado,&lt;br /&gt;Como se tão atual, tão coerente, tão recente...&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;E o mímico lembra.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Ao ver-lhe com um dizer que eu nunca mais diria,&lt;br /&gt;Ao ver-lhe refletir o que o espelho não mostra, (enquanto maqueio minha face)&lt;br /&gt;Ao ver-lhe transbordar em berros o que eu contive em soluços... Desespero-me&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;div&gt;O mímico preservou para mim uma visita ao eu de quem tanto fujo.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E de quem tanto medo tenho em rever.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;
  &lt;a href=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEioeAzYOMtodwEQcePDbYEim-8NPLK_L4subV0LJGdNkHAHmJRZ4IdSOUDrOKIQ5bfrrk-XNSaXPHfA30ue6pg6pXxhvCvw0Dc1MlE1I_D6eXUHDacYCNd-amNWjRgaAnx001oRdNLGcPLizPctCE2URCMmiZ5C6EWC4x8BOawZH1Vuf_Q7rm02C_vWSCk&quot;&gt;
    &lt;/a&gt;&lt;img border=&quot;0&quot; src=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEioeAzYOMtodwEQcePDbYEim-8NPLK_L4subV0LJGdNkHAHmJRZ4IdSOUDrOKIQ5bfrrk-XNSaXPHfA30ue6pg6pXxhvCvw0Dc1MlE1I_D6eXUHDacYCNd-amNWjRgaAnx001oRdNLGcPLizPctCE2URCMmiZ5C6EWC4x8BOawZH1Vuf_Q7rm02C_vWSCk&quot; width=&quot;400&quot; /&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEioeAzYOMtodwEQcePDbYEim-8NPLK_L4subV0LJGdNkHAHmJRZ4IdSOUDrOKIQ5bfrrk-XNSaXPHfA30ue6pg6pXxhvCvw0Dc1MlE1I_D6eXUHDacYCNd-amNWjRgaAnx001oRdNLGcPLizPctCE2URCMmiZ5C6EWC4x8BOawZH1Vuf_Q7rm02C_vWSCk&quot;&gt;
  &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Foto de Ejov Igor&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/8664926676861603301/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' </title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Vossa Excelência&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Crescente iminência&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;De Vossa potência&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Palíndromos"/><title type='text'>Poemas Palíndromos: Pare Lola descanse</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;A Lola:&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Ela, Fale....&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Ela, Fale....&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Era, Pare.&lt;div&gt;Pera pare!&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Anita latina&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Luz azul&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Era pare...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Pera pare!&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Em height="72" width="72"/><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-4916855167478027783</id><published>2025-03-05T01:52:00.002-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:14:32.959-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Sonetos"/><title type='text'>Soneto: Palindromia Sonética </title><content type='html'>&lt;p&gt;Sofro de palindromia, encanto raro,&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Palíndromos são feitos cativantes,&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Que dançam, num vaivém, tão intrigantes,&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;No espelho do sentido mais bizarro.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Anagramicamente análogo, eu paro,&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Rearranjo as ideias flutuantes,&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Pois haicais e repentes, tão vibrantes,&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Na métrica do som, vem em disparo.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;De repente me absorvem, e me tomam,&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Sorvem de mim o intelecto e explodem,&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Em versos que no caos se reacomodam.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;O que era limitação torna-se inspiração,&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;E a estrutura liberta minha mente,&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Soneticamente inspirada, em criação.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div&gt;
  &lt;a href=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEhybNtkRkPYPAdzCxE57tBISppWHOsCYQCNjLMGl9QUzbQAfi_PMnDB0HaFiz3Z0q0Wq8dCCjxAjyUAvscKv-eYfIF8t89v5iwLJQlDOiAN8X2ZpGiR65O8XYda8YJMB792WN9gjzW8hQiVmC4VF1yFX9bMGDcdpi8c8w8YB9WbczAtVrK-vrJsWN8uLr8&quot;&gt;
    &lt;img border=&quot;0&quot; src=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEhybNtkRkPYPAdzCxE57tBISppWHOsCYQCNjLMGl9QUzbQAfi_PMnDB0HaFiz3Z0q0Wq8dCCjxAjyUAvscKv-eYfIF8t89v5iwLJQlDOiAN8X2ZpGiR65O8XYda8YJMB792WN9gjzW8hQiVmC4VF1yFX9bMGDcdpi8c8w8YB9WbczAtVrK-vrJsWN8uLr8&quot; width=&quot;400&quot; /&gt;
  &lt;/a&gt;

rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><media:thumbnail xmlns:media="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/" height="72" width="72"/><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-9047843344574368800</id><published>2025-03-04T12:00:00.001-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:14:45.911-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="575 Haicais"/><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Haicais"/><title type='text'>575 Haicais 63 - Haicai Brutalista</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Minimalismo&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Materialidade&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Brutal Concreto&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/9047843344574368800/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' nessa ordem:&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;1. O ódio,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;2. O tesão&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;3. A sede e&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;4. ver&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/8068382317804149143/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Haicais"/><title type='text'>Haicais de Fios e fé</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Fio de afeto à vista&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;É fio que se fia hoje&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;fiado só amanhã&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Olho-Navalha&lt;br /&gt;Fita o laço &lt;br /&gt;Inaugura o verso&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Fio de afeto&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Fiado sem corte&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;No fio da faca&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;É fã scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Pequenos Poemas"/><title type='text'>Pequenos Poemas - Pequeno Espacinho</title><content type='html'>Quero um espacinho nesse mundo enorme&lt;br /&gt;Para colocar minha criança interior&lt;br /&gt;E com ela brincar sem nenhum pudor&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Para brincar de Lego e de imaginar&lt;br /&gt;E de tudo que possamos pensar&lt;br /&gt;Pra que ela sinta a alegria de estar&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Quero um espacinho de leveza e carícia&lt;br /&gt;De desejos sublimes e amor sem malícia&lt;br /&gt;Será um espacinho pequeno só meu&lt;br /&gt;Que caberá o meu mundo inteiiiiiiro.... e eu!...&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Um lugar onde o nariz é o norte &lt;br /&gt;Com um lençol branco se monta um forte &lt;br /&gt;E o cobertor é o embalo da noite&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Um espacinho com barco pirata&lt;br /&gt;Onde as pelúcias montarão guarda&lt;br /&gt;E barrarão da ansiedade o motim&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Quero um espacinho de abraço e beijo&lt;br /&gt;Com gênio da lâmpada que conceda desejos&lt;br /&gt;Mas um gênio livre igual do Aladdin&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Quero um espaço pro eu pequeno descansar&lt;br /&gt;Olhar pra trás e respirar&lt;br /&gt;Abraçando a mim e pelo que eu passei&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Um espacinho mesmo que breve e fugaz &lt;br /&gt;Pra num momentinho de pequena paz &lt;br /&gt;Dar Band-Aid e carinho ao pequeno eu</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/7734618106439498553/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' </title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Protege o ego&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Autoengano ético&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Impede o ser&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-2787975535263015604</id><published>2025-01-15T12:00:00.001-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:19:42.056-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="575 Haicais"/><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Haicais"/><title type='text'>575 Haicais 15 - Haicai do Aterro</title><content type='html'>&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;Enterrar erros&lt;br /&gt;Só constrói aterros&lt;br /&gt;Cá em desterro&lt;/p&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/2787975535263015604/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/01/575-haicais-15-haicai-do-aterro.html#comment-form' title='0 Comentários'/><link rel='edit' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/2787975535263015604'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/2787975535263015604'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/01/575-haicais-15-haicai-do-aterro.html' title='575 Haicais 15 - Haicai do Aterro'/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-7893701257427589100</id><published>2025-01-15T05:11:00.002-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:20:04.550-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Poesias"/><title type='text'>Poesias: Ágata ou Cacos de calcedônia, quartzo e ametista</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Um dia, a vida destruiu,&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E o cruel calor da Terra à engoliu.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A rocha mais dura que o mundo já viu.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E Tempo pior jamais existiu.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Atropelada, machucada e cansada.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Em cacos e pela pressao sufocada.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Abandonada, culpada e esquecida.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Sofria a pobre rocha derretida.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Num volátil mundo de lava,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Acreditou que nada lhe restava,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Abatida, engatilhada e desesperada,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Retorcida e esmigalhada&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Foi convencida que em existência, era digna apenas do nada.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Mas aqui, caro leitor, ainda nao acaba essa estória,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Guarde com zelo e amor os proximos versos de nossa memoria.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A pobre, que só via nos outros vitória,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Que não se dava conta da própria glória&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Ou do que seria o seu vir-a-ser.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Dos caquinhos, de beleza apoteótica,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A Mãe Terra, de sua maneira caótica,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Lapidou a mais colorida,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Em doçura e gentileza vestida,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Mais dura pedra jamais esculpida.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A Agata, formada em vida-vulcão,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Camada mil de cristalização,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Enche os olhos e o coração.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;De todos que toca com sua vida.&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/7893701257427589100/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/01/agata-ou-cacos-de-calcedonia-quartzo-e.html#comment-form' title='0 Comentários'/><link rel='edit' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/7893701257427589100'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/7893701257427589100'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/01/agata-ou-cacos-de-calcedonia-quartzo-e.html' title='Poesias: Ágata ou Cacos de calcedônia, quartzo e ametista'/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-3908914072702321067</id><published>2025-01-15T05:10:00.002-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T11:44:04.135-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Insônia"/><title type='text'>Insônia Poética - O Primeiro Notívago</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Notívagos existem.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Por que, para o primeiro ser humano ver o sol nascer,&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Alguem teve que não adormecer, e esperar.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Sustentando a noite em claro,&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Esperando o que aconteceria,&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Pra então, só nesse dia,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Testemunhar e espalhar o boato...&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Do espetaculo!&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Que a natureza presenteia aos portadores de olheiras pela manhã.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Todas as manhãs...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;O primeiro dos passarinhos a cantar, a luz do sol colorindo o infinito e pintando de azul a escuridão...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;O céu azul nasce primeiro aos olhos vermelhos&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;separator&quot; style=&quot;clear: both; text-align: center;&quot;&gt;
  &lt;a href=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEifQEZ0VccaLtuJ89MxBClfLvdkNefnGAvwj8jCh5X1r6YRiKqhljeNRznAK4_VpMgvXz78c9ytSkgza2zK8LlY7eTmb2bD1ITKo62IUSc_W-yjEz0CNwz2oLQKeFZwOKM__vjxAx5WUlL8XJGnQv4aUttWquQVBaaUG24OP7NyCsDcuJcKafwd00vXjcQ&quot; imageanchor=&quot;1&quot; style=&quot;margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;&quot;&gt;
    &lt;img border=&quot;0&quot;   src=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEifQEZ0VccaLtuJ89MxBClfLvdkNefnGAvwj8jCh5X1r6YRiKqhljeNRznAK4_VpMgvXz78c9ytSkgza2zK8LlY7eTmb2bD1ITKo62IUSc_W-yjEz0CNwz2oLQKeFZwOKM__vjxAx5WUlL8XJGnQv4aUttWquQVBaaUG24OP7NyCsDcuJcKafwd00vXjcQ&quot; width=&quot;400&quot;&gt;
  &lt;/a&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Foto de Asad Photo Maldives&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/3908914072702321067/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/01/o-primeiro-notivago-nuvem.html#comment-form' title='0 Comentários'/><link rel='edit' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/3908914072702321067'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/3908914072702321067'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/01/o-primeiro-notivago-nuvem.html' title='Insônia Poética - O Primeiro Notívago'/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><media:thumbnail xmlns:media="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/" url="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEifQEZ0VccaLtuJ89MxBClfLvdkNefnGAvwj8jCh5X1r6YRiKqhljeNRznAK4_VpMgvXz78c9ytSkgza2zK8LlY7eTmb2bD1ITKo62IUSc_W-yjEz0CNwz2oLQKeFZwOKM__vjxAx5WUlL8XJGnQv4aUttWquQVBaaUG24OP7NyCsDcuJcKafwd00vXjcQ=s72-c" height="72" width="72"/><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-7042488505517590471</id><published>2025-01-15T05:04:00.003-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:20:12.593-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Poesias"/><title type='text'>Poesia - Manhãs de segunda ou Equilíbrio de gatos</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Dentro de cada um de nós existe um equilíbrio perfeito.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Somos todos quartos de quatro cantos.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Em cada canto do que somos existe um gato,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E Cada gato vê 3 gatos.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Exceto Preguiça, que não abriu os olhos hoje ainda.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A Desídia já acordou repreendendo Raiva por querer por as garras para fora tão cedo.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Enquanto isso, Fome lutava com Preguiça para sair do lugar.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Raiva muitas vezes é o único motivo da Desídia tomar posição nas lutas diárias da casa.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E Preguiça, é quem mantem a Fome controlada, para que não coma os outros gatos.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Desídia consola e permite o descanso da Preguiça enquanto Raiva e fome lutam entre si.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Fome por fim, alimenta a Raiva, que vence a Preguiça e todos acordam finalmente para vencer o dia!&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;separator&quot; style=&quot;clear: both; text-align: center;&quot;&gt;
  &lt;a href=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEjv0f2FO2U_mlYY4B9l0RRYqRTi61bKuC6oextW3vHm83cAIJy_4iN2ifb66yif5RWbGsyeAB_3I3Kyr86WRIxeOo5ZvCIPcCbK9ASPmGbX4UPaKvtxdHQL8ldegR5aRR0vG5UPFJtLB59ALhnyesCJGPy1qWC60iBFrWUxopyxAcvzqNea-sHTwCQKzBk&quot; style=&quot;margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;&quot;&gt;
    &lt;img border=&quot;0&quot; src=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEjv0f2FO2U_mlYY4B9l0RRYqRTi61bKuC6oextW3vHm83cAIJy_4iN2ifb66yif5RWbGsyeAB_3I3Kyr86WRIxeOo5ZvCIPcCbK9ASPmGbX4UPaKvtxdHQL8ldegR5aRR0vG5UPFJtLB59ALhnyesCJGPy1qWC60iBFrWUxopyxAcvzqNea-sHTwCQKzBk&quot; width=&quot;400&quot; /&gt;
  &lt;/a&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/7042488505517590471/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/01/manhas-de-segunda-ou-equilibrio-de.html#comment-form' title='0 Comentários'/><link rel='edit' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/7042488505517590471'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/7042488505517590471'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/01/manhas-de-segunda-ou-equilibrio-de.html' title='Poesia - Manhãs de segunda ou Equilíbrio de gatos'/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><media:thumbnail xmlns:media="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/" url="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEjv0f2FO2U_mlYY4B9l0RRYqRTi61bKuC6oextW3vHm83cAIJy_4iN2ifb66yif5RWbGsyeAB_3I3Kyr86WRIxeOo5ZvCIPcCbK9ASPmGbX4UPaKvtxdHQL8ldegR5aRR0vG5UPFJtLB59ALhnyesCJGPy1qWC60iBFrWUxopyxAcvzqNea-sHTwCQKzBk=s72-c" height="72" width="72"/><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-3387580397993112351</id><published>2025-01-15T05:01:00.002-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:20:28.893-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Oração"/><title type='text'>Oração: Proteção</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Ó Santo guerreiro, paladino invencível na fé.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Vós que trazeis em sua face, impassível esperança e confiança.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Estendei sobre mim vosso escudo.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Empresta-me suas poderosas armas denfenda-me com vossa força e grandeza.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Para que meus inimigos tendo pés, não me alcancem.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Tendo mãos não me peguem, e mesmo tendo olhos, não me vejam.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Para que facas e lanças se quebrem sem meu corpo tocar.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Cordas e correntes arrebentem, sem meu corpo amarrar.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E nem mesmo pensamento ou maledição possam me fazer mal.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Glorioso guerreiro, abençoa-me, abra meus caminhos.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Ajudai-me a vencer todo o desanimo, dai-me coragem e esperança, fortalecei minha fé, auxilia-me em minha luta.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Eu carregarei teu estandarte e andarei vestido com suas cores.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;As garras e o fogo do inimigo se apequenam ante a tua presença em mim.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Suas asas falham e os dentes quebram sem tocar minha pele.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;- Inspirado na oração à São Jorge&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;separator&quot; style=&quot;clear: both; text-align: center;&quot;&gt;
  &lt;a href=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEgnWeX3S625WcPwHkMrDPkFwMfq-9nALH8Xqb1NxMq961cLKw3XKAidqeyqQiTfEwCYjSjtewkG2JI-LFKhTOuzBUPF7uxbXBQTG7eo9BDr3Djf3zaz05RzFPlxl12EYlypq0w289LM2eCzvgCAwH4kdmn-t-RZc_qc01EZCvzK9s_Qd-mK0wL-txuXpOY&quot; imageanchor=&quot;1&quot; style=&quot;margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;&quot;&gt;
    &lt;img border=&quot;0&quot;   src=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEgnWeX3S625WcPwHkMrDPkFwMfq-9nALH8Xqb1NxMq961cLKw3XKAidqeyqQiTfEwCYjSjtewkG2JI-LFKhTOuzBUPF7uxbXBQTG7eo9BDr3Djf3zaz05RzFPlxl12EYlypq0w289LM2eCzvgCAwH4kdmn-t-RZc_qc01EZCvzK9s_Qd-mK0wL-txuXpOY&quot; width=&quot;400&quot;&gt;
  &lt;/a&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/3387580397993112351/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/01/protecao-nuvem.html#comment-form' title='0 Comentários'/><link rel='edit' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/3387580397993112351'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/3387580397993112351'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/01/protecao-nuvem.html' title='Oração: Proteção'/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><media:thumbnail xmlns:media="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/" url="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEgnWeX3S625WcPwHkMrDPkFwMfq-9nALH8Xqb1NxMq961cLKw3XKAidqeyqQiTfEwCYjSjtewkG2JI-LFKhTOuzBUPF7uxbXBQTG7eo9BDr3Djf3zaz05RzFPlxl12EYlypq0w289LM2eCzvgCAwH4kdmn-t-RZc_qc01EZCvzK9s_Qd-mK0wL-txuXpOY=s72-c" height="72" width="72"/><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-510512870362253860</id><published>2025-01-15T04:01:00.002-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:20:52.864-03:00</updated><title type='text'>Pequenos Poemas - A Casa</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Logo por ali,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Existe uma morada,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Residência bela,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Mas nunca habitada.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&amp;nbsp; &amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Vizinhos da casa naquela via&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Bobos ficavam de tanta euforia.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;De tão famosa que a casa ficava&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Daquela rua a primeira da estrada.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Gatuno esperto passava e via,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Que a casa bonita não tinha vigia&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Roubar a tal casa logo tentava&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Mas nem uma porta ou janela se abria.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Vândalos mil à quiseram estragar&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Sem nenhum sucesso ou alguma avaria.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E nem o mais ágil dos gatos podia&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Em seus muros altos fazer cantoria.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;O tempo corria, a casa permanecia.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A cidade cresceu...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Os prédios da rua trouxeram o breu&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Mas impassível, famosa e vazia&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;La sempre se via a tal moradia.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Nem o mais pobre dos operários,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Ou mesmo o mais rico dos empresários&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Aquele endereço não pôde comprar,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Pois, seu valor ninguém pôde estimar.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;O presidente e a primeira dama,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Querendo lucrar com da casa a fama.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Tentaram nela fazer moradia.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Mas a lei da casa não lhes permitia.&amp;nbsp; &amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Tentaram então derrubar o casão,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E estes esforços também foram em vão,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Mesmo à face de grande explosão&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;O teto da casa não vinha ao chão.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A história que contam é que na construção,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Á casa foi dada tanta atenção.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Que nem o empreiteiro ou o arquiteto&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Conseguiram o projeto entender por completo&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Engenheiros buscaram na casa perfeita.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;O material que tal obra era feita,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Investigaram por muito a bela morada&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E de especial encontraram, &quot;nada&quot;.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;...&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A casa hoje é muito conhecida&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Musico e poeta fizeram cantiga&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E todos conhecem aquela balada&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Da casa perfeita e inabitada&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Mesmo estando muito bem escondida,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A casa mais bela é jamais esquecida,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Pois toda criança já foi abrigada&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;No número zero, na casa engraçada.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;
  &lt;a href=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEiyaFJ1AXolR7ljz1dxSI707LQtkFoUU_rgLhwpTN2hVgkBFdWo36bcznrS4AnBPl8Xc0tBpjGhMDD803yjs4ICru3BkzNQ_kenb0A5YgjvjWm9xxoIvv1IKQZxW2mK2LBpyvrH5u98qTlBNak0WyB7b2adqeK2q5ErblgUbSxXu-4RYacBduI3pP_w2DQ&quot;&gt;
    &lt;img border=&quot;0&quot; src=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEiyaFJ1AXolR7ljz1dxSI707LQtkFoUU_rgLhwpTN2hVgkBFdWo36bcznrS4AnBPl8Xc0tBpjGhMDD803yjs4ICru3BkzNQ_kenb0A5YgjvjWm9xxoIvv1IKQZxW2mK2LBpyvrH5u98qTlBNak0WyB7b2adqeK2q5ErblgUbSxXu-4RYacBduI3pP_w2DQ&quot; width=&quot;400&quot; /&gt;
  &lt;/a&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/510512870362253860/comments/default' title='Postar scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Poesias"/><title type='text'> Samba de fé</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Escrevo a ti, a ti mesmo que lê&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Pares de sonhar e passeis a fazer&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Escrevo a vós parada pensando&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Pareis o pensar e comece o amando.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Escrevo à vós e escrevo à mim&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Aos alquebrados de longos suspiros&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Aos corações já sem fé e quebrados&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Pra que essas palavras inspire-os:&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Vinde pra vida! vinde pro sol!&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Sejas você da enseada o farol&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Traga sua luz, sua tocha, sua vela&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Nessa muralha abriremos janela&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Sejamos então o riso primeiro&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Da gargalhada que quebra o roteiro&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Junte-se a nós nesse samba de fé&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Com nossas bobiças ficamos em pé&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;separator&quot; style=&quot;clear: src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-7668299281857447309</id><published>2025-01-09T12:00:00.001-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:22:10.011-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="575 Haicais"/><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Haicais"/><title type='text'>575 Haicais 9 - Haicai sobre Haicais</title><content type='html'>&lt;p&gt;A limitação &lt;br /&gt;Inquieta minha mente&lt;br /&gt;Cria atividade&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;br scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="575 Haicais"/><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Haicais"/><title type='text'>575 Haicais 1 - Haicai de Ano novo</title><content type='html'>&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Explosão no peito&lt;br /&gt;Aquele brilho no olhar&lt;br /&gt;Os Fogos nos céus &lt;br /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/6623180136570563441/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-4577348981467622979</id><published>2024-12-30T19:42:00.002-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:23:58.372-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Poesias"/><title type='text'>Poesia - Me ser e tecer</title><content type='html'>Tecerei,&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt; Eu decidi não desistir,&lt;br /&gt; Viverei pela causa que me toca.&lt;br /&gt; Amor sem par, que se espalha como rede. &lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Tecerei minha casa com fios de Amor,&lt;br /&gt; Sem modelo, seguindo o sentimento da corda,&lt;br /&gt; Criando, junto, meu próprio tecido. &lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Eu fiarei, e vocês fiarão comigo.&lt;br /&gt; Eu me serei, e ao te ser, teceremos.&lt;br /&gt; Costurarei para nós uma rede,&lt;br /&gt; E dela faremos cabana,&lt;br /&gt; Que nos resguarde do frio,&lt;br /&gt; Que nos acolha da chuva. &lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Coloriremos nossa tapeçaria com os fios de amores,&lt;br /&gt; Entrelaçando assim da nossa existência as cores,&lt;br /&gt; Teremos rede que nos divirta,&lt;br /&gt; Para nos embalar no balanço da vida.&lt;br /&gt; Rede que teremos orgulho em fiar. &lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;No fundo, busco família,&lt;br /&gt; Família leve e parceira,&lt;br /&gt; Que compartilha sonhos e lutas,&lt;br /&gt;Carrega junto as dores do ser,&lt;br /&gt; Que desfruta junto afeto e vitórias. &lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Será a festa a cada conquista,&lt;br /&gt; Será o descanso nos dias pesados,&lt;br /&gt; Será a vila que cria as crianças.&lt;br /&gt; A proteção pra trapezista poder voar. &lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Bora viver. &lt;br /&gt; &lt;br /&gt; &lt;br /&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEgLQdCBC-kS4ORadbUzeEOIszKxIYopaUW7SJ8kw_YH8-EGcqNnTj6m9aej_ScBK5IMXV870bGmLFa1WP-V4ikfLUuXXTEEOe76TJ53fI0EXD0JQfBlXwn25Yo6PFomPROjNVIxAunjpnog0x6JP7S1CpcSQokZvp3iz_Q9mx4MeoHPE8wSMrmK3rHyZIg/s862/pexels-photo-5807048.jpeg&quot;&gt;&lt;img border=&quot;0&quot; src=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEgLQdCBC-kS4ORadbUzeEOIszKxIYopaUW7SJ8kw_YH8-EGcqNnTj6m9aej_ScBK5IMXV870bGmLFa1WP-V4ikfLUuXXTEEOe76TJ53fI0EXD0JQfBlXwn25Yo6PFomPROjNVIxAunjpnog0x6JP7S1CpcSQokZvp3iz_Q9mx4MeoHPE8wSMrmK3rHyZIg/w200-h200/pexels-photo-5807048.jpeg&quot; /&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/4577348981467622979/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2024/12/me-ser-e-tecer-nuvem.html#comment-form' title='0 Comentários'/><link rel='edit' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/4577348981467622979'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/4577348981467622979'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2024/12/me-ser-e-tecer-nuvem.html' title='Poesia - Me ser e tecer'/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><media:thumbnail xmlns:media="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/" url="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEgLQdCBC-kS4ORadbUzeEOIszKxIYopaUW7SJ8kw_YH8-EGcqNnTj6m9aej_ScBK5IMXV870bGmLFa1WP-V4ikfLUuXXTEEOe76TJ53fI0EXD0JQfBlXwn25Yo6PFomPROjNVIxAunjpnog0x6JP7S1CpcSQokZvp3iz_Q9mx4MeoHPE8wSMrmK3rHyZIg/s72-w200-h200-c/pexels-photo-5807048.jpeg" height="72" width="72"/><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-4407379237974493848</id><published>2024-12-29T05:08:00.002-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:24:14.211-03:00</updated><title type='text'>Poesias - Floresça</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Desejo que você floresça&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Desejo que você espalhe seus galhos e ramos em direção ao horizonte.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Desejo que o sol nutra suas folhas e que a vida nutra sua alma.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Desejo que você sinta o embalo quando o vento suave soprar sobre você, para lembrar-te que a vida é movimento.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Desejo que você partilhe seus figos suculentos, e também adube seu solo com os outros.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Desejo que nuvens possam te trazer sombra e garoa para encher seus aquíferos.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Desejo que o solo que sustenta suas raízes te dê firmeza, mas que nunca te impeça de correr.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Desejo que nenhum vaso nunca te conforme, que você nunca seja muda de ninguém, que você seja arvore livre em terreno fértil. Seja a ti.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Desejo que você possa ser sombra de alguém mas que você sempre recarregue seu sol.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Desejo que você floresça em toda primavera, mas também no verão, outono e no inverno ao friozinho do vento suli.&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/4407379237974493848/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/01/floresca-nuvem.html#comment-form' title='0 Comentários'/><link rel='edit' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/4407379237974493848'/><link rel='self' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://www.blogger.com/feeds/3783832236844500005/posts/default/4407379237974493848'/><link rel='alternate' type='text/html' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/2025/01/floresca-nuvem.html' title='Poesias - Floresça'/><author><name>Unknown</name><email>noreply@blogger.com</email><gd:image rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-7787754164170367477</id><published>2024-12-13T23:58:00.002-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:24:22.545-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Versos Roubados"/><title type='text'>Poemas Roubados: Tacituras</title><content type='html'>Desviados da alegria&lt;br /&gt;Em linha reta seguimos&lt;br /&gt;Na pobre linha de produção&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Dos cacos e pedaços&lt;br /&gt;À autenticidade verdadeira&lt;br /&gt;Libertará nossos mosaicos&lt;br /&gt;Da porcelanada esteira &lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Tacitamente acordamos&lt;br /&gt;De tacitamente nos despertar&lt;br /&gt;Acordo tácito de silêncio&lt;br /&gt;Acordamos tórridos a falar.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Para se partilhar há de se dividir&lt;br /&gt;Azulejo ao chão então! &lt;br /&gt;Mosaico de Felicidades.</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/7787754164170367477/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Palíndromos"/><title type='text'>Poemas Palíndromo: À diva </title><content type='html'>&lt;div style=&quot;text-align: justify;&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;À diva:&lt;br /&gt; &lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Ame,&lt;br /&gt; O poema, a rota, o ator, &lt;br /&gt; A ame, ó poema, a vida.&lt;p style=&quot;text-align: left;&quot;&gt;&lt;b&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: courier;&quot;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style=&quot;text-align: left;&quot;&gt;&lt;b&gt;&lt;span style=&quot;font-family: scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Haicais"/><title type='text'>Haicais do Arvoredo</title><content type='html'>Em vaso murcha,&lt;br /&gt;Livre em solo fértil,&lt;br /&gt;A muda muda&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Sempre é muda&lt;br /&gt;A árvore no vaso&lt;br /&gt;Até que grite&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Frondosa copa&lt;br /&gt;Seiva adocicada&lt;br /&gt;Raízes fortes&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEiodKHec6QiOZ-v0dfBbNiJ_iX9WyZLKgbgLjB3xAcfQ2Oz2uJY7FFlni05AebW6QE71IEMI3mE61a3ZvrtE_07RUVPMMsAk68H8y1d0WsYv2cXfwf4eiAyzcknS95w_7M80Q0jwMsIWig39m3w7SGZHPSQ95aKcGazZ5gYDQ1pAsa_9YQUZlnID2KVz5U&quot;&gt; &lt;img border=&quot;0&quot; src=&quot;https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEiodKHec6QiOZ-v0dfBbNiJ_iX9WyZLKgbgLjB3xAcfQ2Oz2uJY7FFlni05AebW6QE71IEMI3mE61a3ZvrtE_07RUVPMMsAk68H8y1d0WsYv2cXfwf4eiAyzcknS95w_7M80Q0jwMsIWig39m3w7SGZHPSQ95aKcGazZ5gYDQ1pAsa_9YQUZlnID2KVz5U&quot; /&gt; &lt;/a&gt; &lt;br /&gt;Photo by John-Mark Smith: https://www.pexels.com/photo/low-angle-view-of-pink-flowers-against-blue-sky-250591/</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/2276024009888213100/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html' rel='http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#thumbnail' width='16' height='16' src='https://img1.blogblog.com/img/b16-rounded.gif'/></author><media:thumbnail xmlns:media="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/" url="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEiodKHec6QiOZ-v0dfBbNiJ_iX9WyZLKgbgLjB3xAcfQ2Oz2uJY7FFlni05AebW6QE71IEMI3mE61a3ZvrtE_07RUVPMMsAk68H8y1d0WsYv2cXfwf4eiAyzcknS95w_7M80Q0jwMsIWig39m3w7SGZHPSQ95aKcGazZ5gYDQ1pAsa_9YQUZlnID2KVz5U=s72-c" height="72" width="72"/><thr:total>0</thr:total></entry><entry><id>tag:blogger.com,1999:blog-3783832236844500005.post-5703749420718270615</id><published>2024-10-01T08:00:00.001-03:00</published><updated>2025-07-11T12:24:53.890-03:00</updated><category scheme="http://www.blogger.com/atom/ns#" term="Versos Roubados"/><title type='text'>Poemas Roubados: Tenho roubado versos</title><content type='html'>&lt;div&gt;Tenho roubado versos&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;É o que tenho feito&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Raramente os credito, embora dessa vez sim&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;preciso sentir a arte com as mãos&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;sentir seu corte entre meus dedos&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Arte é feita para tocar é o que sinto&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;então: eu fui feito para senti-la&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Em geral apenas os copio,&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;no caderno, entre as matérias e os desenhos (estes não publíco nunca)&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Ou os edito, formulando novas rimas e novos ritmos.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Tenho recolhido trechos&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Tenho observado longamente seus formatos&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Sentindo que o interpretar é irresistível, sentindo como é prazeroso coletar.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Tenho roubado trechos de jornal,&amp;nbsp;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Para que não os esqueça, como minha mãe me ensinou&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Como se fosse possível salvar os recortes&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;(Mesmo os recortados de nós mesmos)&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Tenho andado a tentar não me repetir e não repetir os outros&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Enquanto esgoto as resmas das folhas da vida&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Tenho as rabiscado com minhas próprias mãos&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Golpeando à caneta&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;E tenho passado as noites sentado à mesa de madeira&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Estudando a troca de letra&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Tenho mastigado os textos&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Procurando separar na boca&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;A leitura do autor, à autoria do leitor&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Percebendo na oração&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Que o sentido é variado&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;O que na escrita era um na leitura vive múltiplo&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Tenho roubado versos&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Para isso deram-me boca&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Tenho também re-encontrado rimas que não escolhi&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Mas encontro-as num ritmo súbito no canto do caderno de manhã&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Tenho sido descuidado, com os olhos no futuro&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Deixando que os delitos apareçam&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;Eu Tenho roubado versos&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;É o que tenho feito&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;i&gt;Versos roubados de: Tenho quebrado copos de Ana Martins Marques&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div&gt;&lt;br /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</content><link rel='replies' type='application/atom+xml' href='https://blog.ameopoema.com/feeds/5703749420718270615/comments/default' title='Postar comentários'/><link rel='replies' type='text/html'
